content:
Craft an item of type: acacia_fence
inventory=[{"type": "white_stained_glass", "quantity": 15, "index": 12}, {"type": "birch_fence", "quantity": 35, "index": 13}, {"type": "dark_oak_button", "quantity": 37, "index": 17}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 48, "index": 20}, {"type": "ocelot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 26, "index": 31}, {"type": "netherite_block", "quantity": 27, "index": 34}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 35}, {"type": "ancient_debris", "quantity": 19, "index": 36}, {"type": "birch_sapling", "quantity": 19, "index": 39}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 42}]

thought: To craft acacia_fence, I need to place 4 acacia_planks in a 'U' shape around a stick in the middle. The first step is to move the acacia_planks from slot 42 to the crafting grid, starting with slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 1 with quantity 1
